metadata.title: CVE-2012-2670 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
manageuser.php in Collabtive before 0.7.6 allows remote authenticatedusers, and possibly unauthenticated attackers, to bypass intended accessrestrictions and upload and execute arbitrary files by uploading an avatarfile with an accepted Content-Type such as image/jpeg, then accessing itvia a direct request to the file in files/standard/avatar.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2670` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

collabtive - 0.7.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: collabtive package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.7.6-1').
